item.description: I didnâ€™t follow the Apple event live â€“ I was sleeping peacefully, unaware of what Apple was announcing. Iâ€™d also skipped the WWDC and Google I/O keynotes. Knowing that the improvements will only be incremental, my excitement for these tech events has dwindled in recent years.

item.description: I love the visits to the library with my daughter. She loves spending time amidst the books â€“ strolling through aisles, looking excitedly at the varied genres of books. Of course, she hasnâ€™t read them all (duh!), but making her choose her book for the day is a difficult task.
